cause.description:
i want to change the dress code for the girls because we dont have any right at all we have to cover up i mean i like covering my body but other girls dont and i think its not fair that guys can have their under band showing and we cant have our bra strap showing so i dont think its fair.
1. dress code change
cause.mission: change the more of the dress code for the girls
cause.name: more right for girls in the dress code.
